properties.name: PolicyDocument
properties.description: A policy to attach to the endpoint that controls access to the service.

properties.name: PrivateDnsEnabled
properties.description: Indicate whether to associate a private hosted zone with the specified VPC.

type.description: Indicate whether to associate a private hosted zone with the specified VPC.

properties.name: RouteTableIds
properties.description: One or more route table IDs.

properties.name: SecurityGroupIds
properties.description: The ID of one or more security groups to associate with the endpoint network interface.

type.description: The ID of one or more security groups to associate with the endpoint network interface.

properties.name: SubnetIds
properties.description: The ID of one or more subnets in which to create an endpoint network interface.

properties.name: VpcId
properties.description: The ID of the VPC in which the endpoint will be used.
